description: List the endpoint groups that are associated with a listener for a custom routing accelerator.

parameters.name: ListenerArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the listener to list endpoint groups for.

nested_items.name: EndpointGroups
nested_items.description: The list of the endpoint groups associated with a listener for a custom routing accelerator.

nested_items.name: EndpointGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint group.

nested_items.name: EndpointGroupRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where the endpoint group is located.

nested_items.name: DestinationDescriptions
nested_items.description: For a custom routing accelerator, describes the port range and protocol for all endpoints (virtual private cloud subnets) in an endpoint group to accept client traffic on.

nested_items.name: FromPort
nested_items.description: The first port, inclusive, in the range of ports for the endpoint group that is associated with a custom routing accelerator.

nested_items.name: ToPort
nested_items.description: The last port, inclusive, in the range of ports for the endpoint group that is associated with a custom routing accelerator.

nested_items.name: Protocols
nested_items.description: The protocol for the endpoint group that is associated with a custom routing accelerator. The protocol can be either TCP or UDP.

nested_items.name: EndpointDescriptions
nested_items.description: For a custom routing accelerator, describes the endpoints (virtual private cloud subnets) in an endpoint group to accept client traffic on.

nested_items.name: EndpointId
nested_items.description: An ID for the endpoint. For custom routing accelerators, this is the virtual private cloud (VPC) subnet ID.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results. You receive this token from a previous call.
